basics.name: TJ McCabe
basics.label: Software Developer

work.summary: I established and managed the continued success of over 30 individual Customer Validation programs for predominantly Fortune 500 companies, including on-site company onboarding, quarterly business reviews, and annual program audits.
highlights: Collaborated with Centercode’s Engineering & QA teams on a daily basis, using an agile approach to identify and track hundreds of monthly bug reports & feature requests from Centercode clients in JIRA

Directly managed the account of Centercode’s largest Customer Validation Services client in terms of revenue and scope, advising their CX (Customer Experience) Team as well as dozens of individual product teams

work.summary: I directed Nook sales, customer service, & inventory.
highlights: Continually coached over 20 booksellers in digital sales
Led monthly in-store promotional events for digital products, acting as B&N’s representative to the public

volunteer.summary: I achieved the rank of Eagle Scout in the BSA in 2006
I taught computer literacy to the less-fortunate

education.institution: The University of California, Los Angeles

projects.title: Meticulist
projects.summary: A single page productivity app that gives visual structure to projects & tasks, modeled after Trello.

projects.title: Baconizer
projects.summary: An interactive game for generating actor & movie chains, based on the 6 Degrees of Kevin Bacon parlor game.

projects.title: DistanSing
projects.summary: A streaming site for artists to host virtual events on the scale of in-person concerts.

projects.title: Jobsy
projects.summary: A single page interactive resume exploration application built around a chatbot. Jobsy took first place in MintBean's 'Hack the Chatbot' Hackathon. Hint: You're looking at it!

awards.title: Hack the Chatbot Hackathon Winner
awards.summary: Two friends and I won Mintbean's 'Hack the Chatbot' Hackathon by building Jobsy, an interactive resume chatbot which you're currently exploring.

awards.title: Eagle Scout
awards.summary: I achieved the rank of Eagle Scout in the BSA in 2006.
